name: Warm Lamp Games
info:
• 别名: 暖灯工作室
  • 别名: Warm Lamp Games
  • 生日: 2015年
  • 总部: 俄罗斯，西伯利亚
detail:
Warm Lamp Games成立于2015年秋天。
开发人员原先来自于Alawar Stargaze。

Warm Lamp Games a game-developing studio founded in Siberia in 2015. Every team member has a strong background of experience in creating and developing successful projects for casual games market. WLG is a team of 11 professionals who gathered to create a game of their dreams. Game development is not only a job, but also a captivating process that we put our hearts and souls into
